name: Zendikar Mega Pack
description: A huge, comprehensive package capturing Zendikar's mechanics: Landfall, Kicker, Traps, Quests (quest counters), Allies, Vampire/Kor/Merfolk/Goblin tribes, Equipment themes, ETB lands, and land-matters synergies. Includes broad string pools and weighted effects per color and type.

ACTIVATED_EFFECT: Target creature gets +{N}/+{N} until end of turn
Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand
ALLY_ETB_EFFECT: target creature you control gets +{N}/+{N} until end of turn
tap target creature an opponent controls
LANDFALL_SMALL: Target creature gets +{N}/+0 until end of turn
Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature
LANDFALL_MED: Target creature gets +{N}/+{N} until end of turn
Target creature can’t block this turn
Exile target card from a graveyard
LANDFALL_BIG: Target creature you control gains trample and gets +{N}/+{N} until end of turn
Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped
Each opponent loses {N} life and you gain {N} life
QUEST_COND: a creature you control deals combat damage to a player
you cast an instant or sorcery spell
a land enters the battlefield under your control
TRAP_COND: if an opponent cast two or more spells this turn
if a creature an opponent controls attacked this turn
if a spell or ability an opponent controls countered a spell this turn
if a creature you control was dealt damage this turn
if an opponent had a land enter the battlefield under their control this turn
KOR_EQUIP_BONUS: As long as {THIS} is equipped, it has vigilance and first strike
Equipped creature gets +{N}/+{N}. If it’s a Kor, it has vigilance
VAMPIRE_PAYOFF: Whenever an opponent loses life, put a +1/+1 counter on {THIS}
At the beginning of your end step, if an opponent lost life this turn, create a {N}/{N} black Vampire creature token with lifelink
MERFOLK_LAND_SYNERGY: Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, tap target creature an opponent controls
Whenever you play an Island, scry {N}
GOBLIN_AGGRO: Whenever {THIS} attacks, it deals {N} damage to target creature defending player controls
ELF_RAMP: Whenever {THIS} attacks, untap up to {N} lands
LAND_ETB_TRIGGERED: When {THIS} enters the battlefield, target creature gets +{N}/+0 until end of turn
When {THIS} enters the battlefield, target creature you control gets +{N}/+{N} and gains trample until end of turn
When {THIS} enters the battlefield, you gain {N} life
When {THIS} enters the battlefield, tap target creature an opponent controls

Creature: Ally — {TRIGGER_INTRO} {THIS} or another Ally enters the battlefield under your control, {ALLY_ETB_EFFECT}.
Landfall — {TRIGGER_INTRO} a land enters the battlefield under your control, {LANDFALL_SMALL}.
Landfall — {TRIGGER_INTRO} a land enters the battlefield under your control, {LANDFALL_MED}.
Kicker {KICKER_COST}. {TRIGGER_INTRO} {THIS} enters the battlefield, if it was kicked, put {N} +1/+1 counters on it.

{TRIGGER_INTRO} {THIS} enters the battlefield, tap up to {N} target creatures an opponent controls.

Target creature gets +{N}/+{N} and gains first strike until end of turn.
Sorcery: Put {N} +1/+1 counters on up to {N} target creatures you control.
Kicker {KICKER_COST}. Create {N} {N}/{N} white {TOKEN_SUBTYPE} creature tokens. If this spell was kicked, creatures you control gain vigilance until end of turn.
Enchantment: {TRIGGER_INTRO} {QUEST_COND}, you may put a quest counter on {THIS}. {QUEST_PAY}: Creatures you control get +{N}/+{N} until end of turn.

Gain control of target creature with mana value {N} or less until end of turn. Untap it. It gains flying until end of turn.
Enchantment: {TRIGGER_INTRO} {QUEST_COND}, you may put a quest counter on {THIS}. {QUEST_PAY}: Tap up to {N} target permanents. They don’t untap during their controllers’ next untap steps.
